attributes.action: request the queen honour ken dodd with a knighthood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: request the queen honour Ken Dodd with a knighthood for services to theatre and the entertainment industry

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
